sourcesContent:
import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const baseURL="http://127.0.0.1:8000/api" function CourseDetail(){ const [chapterData, setChapterData] = useState([]); const [courseData, setCourseData] = useState([]); const [teacherData, setTeacherData] = useState([]); const {course_id}=useParams() // Fetch course details on page load useEffect(()=>{ try{ axios.get(baseURL + '/course/' + course_id).then(response=>{ setCourseData(response.data) setTeacherData(response.data.teacher) }) } catch(error){ console.log(error) } }, []); return(

{courseData.title}

{courseData.description}

Course By: {teacherData.full_name}

Duration: 3 Hours 30 Mins

Total Enrolled: 100

Rating: 4/5

{/* Course Videos */}
Course Videos
  • Introduction 5 Min 30 Sec {/* Video Modal Start */}
    Video 1
    {/* Video Modal End */}
  • Project Setup 5 Min 30 Sec
  • First React Project 5 Min 30 Sec
) } export default CourseDetail
